products.title: Passenger Elevator
products.description: Smooth, safe and energy-efficient elevators designed for residential and commercial buildings.

products.title: Hospital Elevator
products.description: Specially designed elevators for hospitals ensuring patient safety and smooth movement.

products.title: Freight Elevator
products.description: Heavy-duty elevators designed to carry goods safely and efficiently.

products.title: Home Elevator
products.description: Compact and stylish elevators for modern homes and villas.

products.title: MRL Elevator
products.description: Machine Room Less elevators offering space-saving and energy-efficient solutions.

services.title: Elevator Installation
services.description: End-to-end elevator installation services executed by skilled professionals, ensuring precise fitting, smooth operation, and full compliance with national and international safety standards.

services.title: Maintenance & AMC
services.description: Comprehensive maintenance and annual maintenance contracts designed to minimize downtime, improve performance, and extend the lifespan of elevator systems.

services.title: Modernization
services.description: Upgradation of existing elevators with advanced control systems, improved safety features, energy-efficient components, and modern aesthetics.

services.title: Elevator Repair & Breakdown Support
services.description: Quick-response repair services and breakdown support to restore elevator functionality safely and efficiently, reducing inconvenience and operational delays.

services.title: Safety Inspection & Audits
services.description: Detailed safety inspections and performance audits to identify potential risks, ensure compliance, and maintain the highest safety standards.

services.title: Custom Elevator Solutions
services.description: Tailor-made elevator solutions designed to meet specific building requirements, load capacities, and architectural designs.

services.title: Control Panel & System Upgrades
services.description: Installation and upgrading of elevator control panels and automation systems for improved efficiency, reliability, and user experience.

services.title: Energy-Efficient Solutions
services.description: Implementation of energy-saving elevator technologies that reduce power consumption while maintaining optimal performance.

testimonials.name: Amit Sharma
testimonials.message: Dobhal Elevator provided excellent quality elevators with smooth installation and reliable service. Highly recommended.

testimonials.name: Rohit Verma
testimonials.message: Their hospital elevators are extremely smooth and safe. Maintenance support is very responsive.

testimonials.name: Neha Gupta
testimonials.message: Premium aesthetics and great customization options. Dobhal Elevator delivers both quality and design.
